awd_titl_txt: Chapman Conference on the Fate of Particulate and Dissolved Components Within the Amazon Dispersal System; River and    Ocean.
awd_abstract_narration: This proposal requests partial support for travel (mainly                       international) to an American Geophysical Union Chapman                         Conference on the Amazon River dispersal system.  The conference                will be held in the U.S. and will bring together the scientists                 (principally South American and U. S. scientists ) who have been                studying the Amazon River and the dispersal of its sediment onto                the adjacent continental shelf.  The conference will promote                    international collaboration of geologists, oceanographers, and                  climate modelers and will provide the most effecient mechanism                  for an international group of scientists to share and synthesize                the results of their various research projects underway or                      completed over the last decade.
